painPoints.title: Do You Need Specialized
painPoints.description: B'Nore Care is a nurse practitioner-owned agency in Greater Atlanta helping individuals with special needs thrive safely at home. We provide medically expert, family-centered care to ensure your loved one's safety while offering families the specialized support and respite they need to prevent burnout.
painPoints.question: Is Your Loved One Safe Alone at Home?
painPoints.questionDetail: As our loved ones with special needs require more support, it can feel scary to manage their complex medical care at home. Plus, constant fear of what could happen if they have a medical emergency, equipment failure, or sudden change in condition can cause soul-crushing stress.

points.title: Medical Complexity
points.description: Managing complex medical care and equipment failure fears.

points.title: Designed for Comfort
points.description: Care facilities often aren't designed with personal comfort and joy in mind.

points.title: Specialized Nurses
points.description: Qualified nurses are hard to find for private home care.

points.title: Family Respite
points.description: Preventing burnout while ensuring your loved one's safety and comfort.

painPoints.ctaText: If you feel like you've run out of options, call us today. We are here in Greater Atlanta offering specialized care options!

about.title: We believe care is
about.description: Our philosophy centers on individualized assessments, thoughtful matching, and continuous oversight. We serve the whole person‚Äîphysical, emotional, and social‚Äîwhile supporting families as partners in care.

services.title: Specialized Care Options
services.subtitle: B'Nore Care offers a comprehensive range of clinical and personal care services designed to support individuals of all ages with complex medical conditions in the comfort of their own home.

serviceCards.title: Skilled Nursing Assessments
serviceCards.description: Comprehensive clinical oversight by our expert nursing team to monitor health status and coordinate care.

serviceCards.title: Ventilator & Respiratory Support
serviceCards.description: Specialized care for individuals requiring respiratory assistance, including ventilator management and monitoring.

serviceCards.title: Tracheostomy Care
serviceCards.description: Expert management of tracheostomy tubes, ensuring airway safety and proper maintenance.

serviceCards.title: G-Tube & Feeding Support
serviceCards.description: Assistance with enteral nutrition, including G-Tube feeding, maintenance, and nutritional monitoring.

serviceCards.title: Medication Administration
serviceCards.description: Precise and timely delivery of complex medication regimens by trained clinical professionals.

serviceCards.title: Seizure Management
serviceCards.description: Vigilant monitoring and emergency response planning for individuals with seizure disorders.

ctaSection.title: Schedule Your Free In-Home Assessment Today!
ctaSection.description: Our family-centered approach ensures your loved one gets the care they deserve. Call us at (770) 674-6448 or email support@bnorecare.com to start your journey.

trustPoints.title: Owned by a Nurse Practitioner
trustPoints.description: Direct clinical leadership guarantees the highest standards of medical care and specialized expertise.

trustPoints.title: Specialized Training
trustPoints.description: Our nurses and caregivers are specifically trained in complex needs for all ages, from ventilator support to wound care.

trustPoints.title: GAPP, Medicaid & Waivers Accepted
trustPoints.description: We work with GAPP, CCSP, SOURCE, Medicare, and Medicaid to ensure your family gets the support needed without financial barriers.

trustPoints.title: Family-Centered Respite
trustPoints.description: We don‚Äôt just care for the patient; we support families to prevent burnout and provide peace of mind.

testimonials.title: Stories of Hope
testimonials.subtitle: See how B'Nore Care has helped children in the Greater Atlanta area thrive and families find peace.

testimonials.feedback: B'Nore Care has been a lifesaver. Having a Nurse Practitioner oversee our care gives us a level of confidence we never had before. They truly feel like family.
testimonials.name: Sarah M.

testimonials.feedback: The specialized nursing care for my mother's tracheostomy has been exceptional. I can finally sleep at night knowing she is in safe, expert hands.
testimonials.name: James R.

testimonials.feedback: Finding a team that understands complex needs in Atlanta was hard until we found B'Nore Care. They made the assessment so easy.
testimonials.name: Elena W.

refer.title: Help Another Child
refer.description: Do you know a family struggling to manage their child's complex medical care at home? Refer them to B'Nore Care for expert support.

reasons.title: Expert Clinical Leadership
reasons.description: Owned and operated by a Nurse Practitioner with deep expertise in complex care.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers about home health care and how B'Nore Care can support your family.

questions.question: What is the focus of B'Nore Care?
questions.answer: We specialize in home care for individuals of all ages, from children to seniors, with special needs and complex medical conditions. Our agency is nurse practitioner-owned, ensuring a high level of clinical expertise.

questions.question: Do you accept GAPP and other Medicaid waivers?
questions.answer: Yes, we accept GAPP (for children), as well as CCSP, SOURCE, Medicare, and Medicaid to help families access the critical skilled nursing care their loved ones need.

questions.question: What areas of Atlanta do you serve?
questions.answer: We serve the entire Greater Atlanta area and all surrounding counties, bringing expert care directly to your home.

questions.question: What kind of skilled nursing do you provide?
questions.answer: Our team provides specialized support including Ventilator and Respiratory management, Tracheostomy care, G-Tube feeding, Medication administration, and Seizure monitoring.

ctaSection.title: Still have concerns?
ctaSection.description: We are here to listen and help you navigate your child's care journey.
